addresses: 9/28, Daniel Varuzhan dist., Avan, Yerevan, Armenia
about.summary: Dynamic and results-oriented full-stack software engineer with over 2 years' experience in designing, developing and maintaining enterprise-level applications. Proficient in both front-end and back-end development with a strong focus on implementing and optimising scalable, high performance solutions. Proven ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time and exceed client expectations.

experience.title: Web and Mobile applications development
experience.description: Integration of an agriculture automation app, connecting it seamlessly with various technologies. This empowers farmers to automate tasks, optimize resource use, and remotely manage processes for improved crop yields. My role spanned user-friendly interface design, back-end API development, and robust security measures. The result is a holistic solution enhancing the overall user experience and promoting sustainable agriculture.
roles: Interface Design: Creating intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for real-time monitoring of agricultural processes.
API Development: Designing and implementing back-end APIs to integrate the application with diverse agricultural technologies such as sensors, drones, and automated machinery.

experience.title: Web applications development
experience.description: Developing a comprehensive website to educate the general public about firearm use, safety protocols and responsible ownership.
roles: Development of the required UI features for the web app

education.major: Computer and Information Systems Security/ Information Assurance

interests.name: Football
interests.humorousDescription: Weekend warrior on the field, where my tackling is slightly better than my post-game snack skills.
interests.description: I love playing football with my friends. It's a great way to stay active and have fun.

interests.name: Hiking
interests.humorousDescription: I hike to burn off the calories from my cooking experiments. The views are just a bonus.
interests.description: I enjoy hiking in the mountains and exploring new trails. It's a great way to stay active and enjoy nature.

interests.name: Chess
interests.humorousDescription: Master of the 64 squares who sees life as one big game of tactics and strategy—just waiting for that checkmate moment!
interests.description: I’m passionate about chess, having dedicated 4 years of intense training and achieving a degree in the game. Chess is more than a hobby; it’s a mental challenge that sharpens my strategic thinking and problem-solving skills.

interests.name: Cooking
interests.humorousDescription: I cook to eat, and I eat to cook. It's a delicious cycle that I'm happy to be a part of.
interests.description: I enjoy cooking and trying out new recipes. It's a creative and rewarding way to relax and unwind after a long day.
